front.title: Definition of a Uniform Resource Name (URN) Namespace for the Schema for Academia (SCHAC)

abstract.t: This document describes a Uniform Resource Name (URN) namespace for the Schema for Academia (SCHAC). This namespace is for naming persistent resources defined by the SCHAC international activity participants, their working groups and other designated subordinates. The main use will be the creation of controlled vocabulary values for attributes in the SCHAC schema. These values will be associated to particular instances of persons or objects belonging to any of the SCHAC object classes.
